attributes.action: Help chefs by limiting the maximum amount of hours they can work in a week to 40 or below
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chefs all over the uk are working 60+ hours a week providing a public service.  Most of them sign a contract excluding them from normal regulations. There are laws stating a minimum temperature you can work at but there isn't a specified maximum temperature! Working 60+ hours a week in temperatures of 30 celcius and above cant be good for your health! We havn't even got a Union. Help us!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
